nodes.text: HoloNet News Special Report: Rise in Citizen Reporting Results in Captured Criminals
HoloNet News Special Report: Rise in Citizen Reporting Results in Captured Criminals is the fifth video from the Star Wars Rebels tie-in website, Holonetnews.com. It was posted on September 11, 2014.

The Imperial broadcaster Alton Kastle carried a report that local inspectors report that an increase in citizen reporting have led to the capture of several petty thieves and black marketers. Kastle then reminds his listeners that no crime is victimless and that the citizens of Lothal must do their part to ensure a "peaceful and secure society." He closed his broadcast by telling them that their Empire thanks them for their efforts. The report is accompanied by a hologram image of stormtroopers inspecting an Ugnaught trader.
